Портал — разрыв в пространстве-времени, искусственного или естественного происхождения, позволяющий материи мгновенно перемещаться между двумя точками пространства или времени (т. н. «временно́й портал»). Также во многих произведениях жанра фэнтези портал представляет собой искусственно создаваемый проход, «коридор» или «окно» из одного места в другое (или даже из одного мира в другой), обычно создаваемый магом для перемещения персонажей. Часто (но не обязательно) такой портал описывается как «окно» со светящейся рамкой, встречаются также описания портала в виде зеркальной, совершенно чёрной или равномерно светящейся поверхности. В некоторых случаях портал изображается в виде «чёрной дыры».

mod edit: adjusted milliseconds to match the demos
PLEASE NOTE! Throughout the run you have gained a small but consistent advantage from the ABH-effect caused by holding W while bunnyhopping. When holding W, whenever you're looking in a direction that is not exactly equal to the direction you're moving, you get extra speed from the ABH mechanic. This is illegal in glitchless! So in the future, either stop holding W when bunnyhopping (which is also a lot easier to control, I might add), or, if you must hold W, only bunnyhop in dead straight lines. Thank you.

My original goal was 25:XX, but after practicing a bit, I realized that I could do 23:XX. Glad I hit my goal! Also, I now have a signature way to end a speedrun. After defeating Glados I run to the room entrance (the door is closed) and hide behind two chairs. This prevents me from being sucked into the sky at the end as the screen fades to white. I found it fun to do, so I thought I'd end all my runs like that. (Note to mod: I believe I got my time without loads right this time [I didn't know how to do it last time]. But forgive me if I didn't do it right!)

*Mod note: Your run was not breaking any rules so don't worry about that. You didn't set up livesplit correctly so I'll just inform you. We start at chamber 0, that way we go up to 19 still. You have to split on every load meaning there are multiple chambers in one map, so a split could look something like "Chamber 00/01" seeing as they are in the same map. there is an autosplitter included in livesplit and if you have any questions about it feel free to ask in the discord (someone made a tutorial on it, but I'm not sure if it has been uploaded yet). I would also like to inform you that there is an empty livesplit file in the resources section of this website. This file has all the correct splits, but you will still have to enable the autosplitter yourself.

On top of that you might want to check out the google document with all the speedrun strats. I'm sure you can shave off at least a couple of minutes easily with those. You can find it under guides or if you for some reason cannot find it here is a link: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1H7AHqiSTRzJE2xfqPCGBsUXZay1g9wdUfCbPXoz8S3c/edit#heading=h.uamc62hulz17

mod note: it looks to me like you're holding W while bunnyhopping. Ideally you would not be holding, and only using A and D to strafe. If you do want to hold W though, you MUST keep your mouse steady and looking straight ahead. If you do not look straight ahead when bhopping while holding W, you get an ABH effect, which is a glitch, so be careful!
